sourcesContent:
<script>
import { getAdmins, updateAdmin, insertAdmin } from "@/services/adminService";

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      AdminsInfo: [],
      formVisible: false,
      selectedAdmin: {
        admin_id: null,
        username: "",
        password: "",
        email: "",
        phone_no: "",
      },
    };
  },

  created() {
    this.getAdminsInfo();
  },

  methods: {
    async getAdminsInfo() {
      try {
        this.AdminsInfo = await getAdmins();
      } catch (error) {
        console.error("Error fetching admin data:", error);
      }
    },

    openForm(adminInfo) {
      this.selectedAdmin = { ...adminInfo };
      this.formVisible = true;
    },

    async saveAdmin() {
      try {
        if (this.selectedAdmin.admin_id) {
          await this.updateAdmin();
        } else {
          await this.insertAdmin();
        }
      } catch (error) {
        console.error("Error saving admin:", error);
      }
    },

    async updateAdmin() {
      try {
        const responseData = await updateAdmin(
          this.selectedAdmin.admin_id,
          this.selectedAdmin
        );
        this.handleApiResponse(responseData);
      } catch (error) {
        console.error("Error updating admin:", error);
      }
    },

    async insertAdmin() {
      try {
        const responseData = await insertAdmin(this.selectedAdmin);
        this.handleApiResponse(responseData);
      } catch (error) {
        console.error("Error inserting admin:", error);
      }
    },

    handleApiResponse(responseData) {
      if (responseData && responseData.message) {
        console.log(responseData.message);
        this.formVisible = false;
        this.getAdminsInfo();
      } else if (responseData && responseData.error) {
        console.error(responseData.error);
      } else {
        console.error("Unexpected response format");
      }
    },

    closeForm() {
      this.formVisible = false;
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style>
#modal-form {
  position: absolute;
  width: 50%;
  top: 25%;
  left: 25%;
  display: none;
}
.modal-buttons {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: end;
  width: 100%;
  gap: 1rem;
  padding-top: 1rem;
}
</style>
